titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Panama
Panama

div.head: Legislation
div.p: There is no systematic declassification of documents. All material from the period before Panamanian independence (1903) is available in the central National Archives.

div.head: Location
div.p: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs in located in the Casco Viejo of Panama City.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs has an archives department that is open to researchers with a letter from a representing academic or government institution. Regulations require that an officer of the Archives Department must authorize any documents before viewing by a researcher.
